pr_title: feat: Add IDMS DML support for IDMS-CONTROL section #704

timeline.author: temanbrcom

replies.bodyText:
There are two important points

We need to separate IDMS grammar into different .g4 file. Application gets highly tied, please extract to different grammar files. Currently we have CICS, DB2, and will be IDMS used as extension onto Cobol
generated sources committed, please revert them back  (seems already removed, OK now ;) )
replies.author: asatklichov

replies.bodyText: IDMS is not a separate language, so it doesn't have one entry point like EXEC CICS. So the grammar would be cleaner if we don't separate the IDMS.
replies.author: temanbrcom

replies.bodyText: Then, better to put it into Cobol, not CICS
replies.author: asatklichov
